name: Starry VS Night Stars Banditos
description:
My submission to the Paint Jam 2019

Help Starry, the old sherif to defeat the hord of the Night Stars Banditos ! And get back your Tequilas !

Press Space to start the game.

A/D To move ; Space to jump.

Right-click to cock your Gun ; Left-click to shot.

Your gun need to be cocked to shot.

F to use your whip.

Have fun !

Don't drink and jam kids !

I don't remember who composed the music I badly interpret here... All credits to him anyway.
